alert.note: Alert for Bering Strait Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Interior Seward Peninsula; Lower Kobuk Valley; Lower Koyukuk Valley; Middle Yukon Valley; Noatak Valley; South Slopes of the Western Brooks Range; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; Upper Kobuk Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 09 at 1:03PM AKST until November 13 at 4:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 5 to 10 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Parts of the West Coast, Northwest Arctic, and Western Brooks Range. * WHEN...From late Saturday night through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
